data.title: Cheap flights to Equatorial Guinea
data.meta_description: Find the cheapest flights to Equatorial Guinea. Compare different airlines, choose the best price, and book your cheap plane ticket to Equatorial Guinea.
data.text:
The country in Africa where the official language is Spanish and the currency is the Central African CFA franc (XAF), this is Equatorial Guinea. The capital of the country is Malabo. Other cities which you can visit are Bata.

During your journey around Equatorial Guinea, you can try Paella, Bilola, Pepe-Soup, Bambucha (Mendjaha), Pambota and many other local foods.

Equatorial Guinea general information

Equatorial Guinea uses the Central African CFA franc (XAF). Therefore, we advise you to exchange money for the best rates before your trip.

Nowadays, almost 1.47 million residents live in Equatorial Guinea.

The official language of Equatorial Guinea is Spanish. However, travelers will also commonly hear Kombe as it is the language of the largest international communities within Equatorial Guinea.

Equatorial Guinea shares border with Cameroon, Gabon.

Equatorial Guinea has a tropical climate. Summers are usually dry and hot, while winters are mild. If you are going to Equatorial Guinea in the summer, remember to pack sunscreen, hat and sunglasses. Also, before traveling to Equatorial Guinea, we recommend you learn about local traditions to pack appropriate clothes.
